levels.description: Automatically activates when your health falls to 15% of your Max HP or below. Restores 20% of Max HP every 1 sec for 3 sec. Cooldown: 410 sec.
Automatically activates when your health falls to 15% of your Max HP or below. Restores 23% of Max HP every 1 sec for 3 sec. Cooldown: 370 sec.

When attacking, has a 15% chance to identify the weakness of the enemy with the highest Max HP among those struck, granting you the following bonuses against them: Damage per Stack: +1%, Enemy DEF Ignored per Stack: +1%, Effect Duration: 10 sec, Stacks up to 3 times.

When attacking, has a 17% chance to identify the weakness of the enemy with the highest Max HP among those struck, granting you the following bonuses against them: Damage per Stack: +1%, Enemy DEF Ignored per Stack: +1%, Effect Duration: 10 sec, Stacks up to 3 times.
Chance to add monsters to Monster Collection: +10%, Critical Rate: +3%.
Chance to add monsters to Monster Collection: +15%, Critical Rate: +4%.
Upon debuffing an enemy, Damage: +3%. Duration: 10 sec. Cooldown: 20 sec.
Upon debuffing an enemy, Damage: +6%. Duration: 10 sec. Cooldown: 20 sec.
STR: +20, DEX: +20, INT: +20, LUK: +20, Max HP: +350, Max MP: +350, Damage Taken: -5%.
STR: +30, DEX: +30, INT: +30, LUK: +30, Max HP: +525, Max MP: +525, Damage Taken: -7%.

Returns you to Elluel (Cooldown: 1800 sec). Additional Effect: Permanently receive 15% additional EXP.
Returns you to Elluel (Cooldown: 1800 sec). Additional Effect: Permanently receive 20% additional EXP.

Fatal Attack Survival Chance: 10%.
Grants 1 seconds of invincibility after being revived. Removed upon moving to another map.
Grants 2 seconds of invincibility after being revived. Removed upon moving to another map.

After completing Time to Prepare at least 1 time, then upon either defeating 8 enemies or attacking a boss 5 times, damage increases by 9% for 20 sec, for every 5 times you've stacked Time to Prepare. Cooldown: 40 sec

After completing Time to Prepare at least 1 time, then upon either defeating 8 enemies or attacking a boss 5 times, damage increases by 17% for 20 sec, for every 5 times you've stacked Time to Prepare. Cooldown: 40 sec
Attacks against weaker opponents deal +3% damage. Attacks against monsters afflicted by Abnormal Statuses deal +3% damage.
Attacks against weaker opponents deal +6% damage. Attacks against monsters afflicted by Abnormal Statuses deal +6% damage.
+60% skill damage for 10 sec when active. Cooldown: 90 sec. Skill effects reduced to half when used with link skill.
+90% skill damage for 10 sec when active. Cooldown: 90 sec. Skill effects reduced to half when used with link skill.
+120% skill damage for 10 sec when active. Cooldown: 90 sec. Skill effects reduced to half when used with link skill.
Boss Damage: +2%. Increases damage by 1% up to 4% for each party member, including yourself, on the same map. If you are not in a party, you will be considered to be in your own party.
Boss Damage: +4%. Increases damage by 2% up to 8% for each party member, including yourself, on the same map. If you are not in a party, you will be considered to be in your own party.
Activated when moving a certain distance. Max number of stacks: 6 times, Duration: 5 sec, Damage per stack: +1%.
Activated when moving a certain distance. Max number of stacks: 6 times, Duration: 5 sec, Damage per stack: +2%.
Activates when the combat state continues for 5 sec. Can be stacked a max of 5 times. Duration: 5 sec. When activated, damage increases by 1%, and damage increases an extra 1% per stack.
Activates when the combat state continues for 5 sec. Can be stacked a max of 5 times. Duration: 5 sec. When activated, damage increases by 1%, and damage increases an extra 2% per stack.
Activates when the combat state continues for 5 sec. Can be stacked a max of 5 times. Duration: 5 sec. When activated, damage increases by 1%, and damage increases an extra 3% per stack.
All Stats: 15, Attack Power Increase: 10, Magic Attack Power Increase: 10.
All Stats: 25, Attack Power Increase: 15, Magic Attack Power Increase: 15.

Permanent Damage Increase: 10%.
Damage: +3%. Activate nature's help upon defeating 20 normal monsters. Increases Damage Against Normal Monsters by 5% for 30 sec. when nature's help is active.Cooldown: 30 sec.
Damage: +7%. Activate nature's help upon defeating 20 normal monsters. Increases Damage Against Normal Monsters by 11% for 30 sec. when nature's help is active.Cooldown: 30 sec.
Enemy DEF Ignored: +5%, Damage: +10% against enemies with 100% HP.
Enemy DEF Ignored: +9%, Damage: +14% against enemies with 100% HP.

Damage: +3%. Upon attacking, Recovery Chance: 100%, Recovery: 1% of Max HP/MP per sec, Duration: 5 sec. Cooldown: 30 sec
Damage: +5%. Upon attacking, Recovery Chance: 100%, Recovery: 2% of Max HP/MP per sec, Duration: 5 sec. Cooldown: 30 sec

When attacking a Boss monster, damage increases by +2%. If the target is a Boss monster, each successful attack additionally increases damage by 2%, stacking up to 6 times. The stack can be triggered once every 2 seconds. Duration: 5 seconds.

When attacking a Boss monster, damage increases by +4%. If the target is a Boss monster, each successful attack additionally increases damage by 2%, stacking up to 6 times. The stack can be triggered once every 2 seconds. Duration: 5 seconds.
